channel.title: Hugo on tiany's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on tiany's Blog

item.title: Build your blog by Hugo + Github Pages
item.description: 0 Foreword This is my first blog and I want to record the process I build this blog site on Windows. 1 Prerequisites First, you need to download/install the following: Go Git Hugo Please add them to environment variables. You can check using the following commands: go version git version hugo version 2 Build your site 2.1 generate folder Run the following command: hugo new site my_blog It would generate a folder named my_blog in current directory and the following are the functions of these files/folders:
